proto.ContactInfo.jsonschema.strict.json.description: ContactInfo represents contact information with phone and address

address.description: address must be at most 500 characters

countryCode.description: country code must be exactly 2 uppercase letters

phone.description: phone must match phone number pattern (optional)

proto.ContactInfo.jsonschema.strict.json.title: Contact Info

proto.SimpleUser.jsonschema.strict.json.description: SimpleUser represents a user with basic string, email, and numeric validations

contactInfo.description: contactInfo is an optional nested message

email.description: email must be a valid email format

name.description: name must be between 3 and 50 characters

proto.SimpleUser.jsonschema.strict.json.title: Simple User
